p:
As reported on 21 April, the most common symptoms of COVID‐19 reported in Europe are fever/chills (49%), dry or productive cough (24%), sore throat (12%), general weakness (8%), pain (7%), rhinorrhoea (4%) and diarrhoea (2%).
8 These data are largely from Germany and may not be representative of all COVID‐19 cases. Complications include cardiomyopathy, thrombosis, acute kidney injury and encephalitis.
